last_episode_to_air.name: The Country Club Murders
last_episode_to_air.overview: The team investigate a West Virginia country club notorious for an unsolved double homicide on a secluded lovers' lane; the murdered lovebirds may now haunt the halls of the grand establishment, or something more sinister may be at play.

name: Kindred Spirits
overview: Ghost hunters Adam Berry and Amy Bruni help real families who claim to be bedeviled by paranormal activity in their homes.

episodes.name: Cabin in the Woods
episodes.overview: An aggressive ghost scratches a person and breaks objects at a desolate cabin. Amy and Adam head deep into the Pennsylvania woods to uncover answers for the family, and find the spirit stalking them.

episodes.name: Shoebox Murder
episodes.overview: A hostile spirit attacks a homeowner and smashes objects. This sinister ghost preys on Amy and Adam’s fear to get them to leave the house. A stunning breakthrough leads the investigation toward an infamous unsolved murder.

episodes.name: Lost Amy
episodes.overview: An investigation into a shadow figure takes an emotional turn for Amy when a psychic makes a shocking discovery. And, a growling voice makes the team fear the ghost is more negative than they were led to believe.

episodes.name: The Basement
episodes.overview: A family won't step foot in the basement after a brutal murder takes place. Kids are seeing shadow figures, and a "scary man" in the closet. Amy and Adam bring in advanced paranormal gadgets, and find shocking evidence on camera.

episodes.name: Breaking and Entering
episodes.overview: A New England woman says her security system recorded unexplained voices that were so frightening she had to flee her home, and Amy and Adam wonder if it has something to do with a previous owner's suicide.

episodes.name: Trapped in the Attic
episodes.overview: A little boy is terrorized by a shadow man, so his mom makes their living space off-limits because she's so scared of the activity.

episodes.name: Shadows
episodes.overview: An 11-year-old girl is scared by a menacing ghost and she won't sleep alone in her room, and Amy and Adam wonder if the disturbed grave of a large Native American man holds any clues.

episodes.name: Buried Alive
episodes.overview: A teen is tormented by an unknown spirit and is afraid to stay at home, so Amy and Adam investigate a crawlspace in an upstairs bedroom and begin to wonder if a family member who was buried alive could be responsible.

episodes.name: The Legacy of Lizzie Borden
episodes.overview: The Lizzie Borden House in Fall River, Mass., is visited in the Season 2 premiere, which follows Amy and Adam as they try to help a tour guide who believes her grandparents' spirits are in the house trying to protect her from impending tragedy.

episodes.name: The Executioner
episodes.overview: Adam and Amy investigate the home of a former executioner who killed hundreds of criminals, and now something's trying to kill the current homeowner.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Holmes
episodes.overview: A full-bodied apparition terrorizes two young girls at night and Adam and Amy catch it on camera; a heinous murder committed more than 100 years ago might help close the investigation.

episodes.name: Uninvited Guests
episodes.overview: A terrified couple calls for help after witnessing a chair levitate in their home; Amy endures a chilling paranormal experience in an upstairs bedroom; a psychic's visit later reveals a horrifying truth that leaves Adam and Amy shocked.

episodes.name: The Strangler
episodes.overview: Two parents, three kids, all paralyzed by fear. The spirit targets each child, but only one has been strangled. The other two are visited at night. The spirit speaks to them. Maybe it's passing along a message? Or maybe they're next on the list?

episodes.name: Native Roots
episodes.overview: An aggressive spirit torments a woman everywhere she goes: in and out of her house, on errands, even overnight trips. It lashes out by poking her and breaking items in the house. Amy & Adam launch a full-scale investigation to determine the culprit.

episodes.name: The Neighbor
episodes.overview: Amy and Adam investigate two properties simultaneously, and both homes are afflicted by the same entity; a cache of haunted objects is key to solving this case, but they belonged to different people.

episodes.name: Fire Starter
episodes.overview: A home catches fire and the owners are certain the cause was paranormal. Their daughter always sensed a dark presence looming, and now she believes something is targeting her family. Amy and Adam think she might be psychic and launch a unique investigation.

episodes.name: Shadow of a Doubt
episodes.overview: A home in constant turmoil leaves a child sleepless in a room haunted by a shadowy mass that scares the child at night and taunts his mother, growling at her from the closet.

episodes.name: Murderous Victims
episodes.overview: Amy and Adam visit a home that previously housed an executioner who killed hundreds of criminals.

episodes.name: Family Terrorized
episodes.overview: Amy and Adam come to the aid of a family terrorized by a spirit targeting the children.

episodes.name: No Salvation
episodes.overview: Amy and Adam are called to Liberty, Mo., to investigate the Odd Fellows Home, a massive compound that once cared for orphans and the elderly; more than 10,000 people died on the property, and their pain has fostered a malevolent entity.

episodes.name: Satanic Panic
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry investigate a Connecticut home where lives are at stake. Their client believes an evil entity is responsible for killing her children, and it's living in her home. Is the rest of her family safe?

episodes.name: A Haunting in Gettysburg
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry investigate a haunted mirror in Gettysburg, PA, one of the most paranormally active places in America. Abnormal activity turned to unrest when an entity suddenly became physical. Is the mirror a portal?

episodes.name: Terror in the Woods
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry investigate a supernatural attachment that's causing physical harm to a teenage boy. He thinks the entity followed him out of the woods and is now living in his Massachusetts home.

episodes.name: The Shadow of Death
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry visit Waverly Hills Sanatorium in Louisville, KY. Considered the most haunted location in America, the massive building houses countless spirits, but a dangerous entity on the fourth floor is cause for major concern.

episodes.name: Blood in the Water
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry head to Tennessee to investigate Hales Bar Dam, a location cursed by a chieftain warlord. Centuries later the curse still wreaks havoc on the land, and the current owner fears an evil entity is out for revenge.

episodes.name: Dying Regrets
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry investigate a Virginia plantation where an evil overseer who died after the Civil War has returned to strike fear into the living by seeking out the dead he once brutalized.

episodes.name: Ghost Train
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry look into one of the oldest homes on Cape Cod, where violent spiritual activity threatens a family and their baby. Amy and Adam break new ground as they unveil a never-before-seen paranormal experiment.

episodes.name: The Villisca Axe Murders
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry investigate an Iowa farmhouse where a family was brutally murdered by an unknown assailant in 1912. They fear the killer's spirit still resides in the home and is trying to continue his death toll in the afterlife.

episodes.name: The Search for Lizzie Borden
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry are the first paranormal investigators to enter Maplecroft, the mansion where Lizzie Borden died. They hope it is a groundbreaking opportunity to speak with the spirit of the alleged ax murderer.

episodes.name: School Spirit
episodes.overview: The Farrar Schoolhouse in Maxwell, Iowa, closed years ago, but a dark paranormal force recently seized control of the building. Witnesses claim a massive 14-foot entity now runs rampant through the four-story schoolhouse, prompting the caretakers to call in help. Amy Bruni and Adam Berry crack into the haunted space in search of answers. When shocking details regarding a cold-case murder align with information gathered during the investigation, there’s no choice but to call on the help Chip Coffey. Where did this massive entity come from? And why is it so angry?

episodes.name: Hell House
episodes.overview: The infamous haunted house in Harrisville, Rhode Island (featured in the film, “The Conjuring”) has awoken once more. Once plagued by demonic activity, the house earned endless notoriety after paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren documented the insane activity that transpired there. Now Amy Bruni and Adam Berry step inside this tormented home and seek answers to the unknown. And the best way to do that is by bringing in the family too scared to live there any more—The Perrons. It’s a risky move and a dangerous experiment, but it’s the only way to expose the truth behind this horrible haunting. Will Amy and Adam be more successful than former investigators? Will they bring peace to the Perrons and the new family who settled there? Or will darkness prevail?

episodes.name: Silent Fear
episodes.overview: Paranormal investigators Amy Bruni and Adam Berry help a family haunted by a demented shadow creature. A thrilling investigation with psychic medium Chip Coffey leads to a rare realization.

episodes.name: Dead Men Tell Tales
episodes.overview: The Old Jail in St. Augustine, Florida, exhibits disturbing paranormal activity, which is a major concern considering the violent criminals were once incarcerated there.

episodes.name: Vaulted Secrets
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry investigate a Connecticut restaurant once used as a makeshift morgue after a flood ravaged the town. Psychic medium Chip Coffey is called in to confront a powerful poltergeist haunting the building.

episodes.name: Nowhere to Run
episodes.overview: Paranormal Investigators Amy Bruni and Adam Berry help a single mother left home alone with two frightened children after terrifying, full-bodied apparitions drove away her family. Psychic medium Chip Coffey must figure out who -- or what -- is to blame.

episodes.name: The Trunk
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry visit a Florida museum where multiple attacks on volunteers have sparked the urgent need for a paranormal investigation. They bring in psychic medium Chip Coffey to find out why the aggressive entity is lashing out.

episodes.name: Etched in Evil
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry investigate strange, mysterious symbols etched on the walls of an Indiana asylum. Psychic medium Chip Coffey joins the case to help them find out if the symbols are responsible for an uptick in paranormal activity on the property.

episodes.name: What Lies Beneath
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry, along with psychic medium Chip Coffey, investigate the murky depths of the Sterling Hill Mines in Ogdensburg, NJ. Decades of horrific deaths have fostered a dark energy that lurks in the shadows of miles of underground tunnels.

episodes.name: Blackout
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey answer the desperate call of a couple suffering from relentless paranormal attacks in their home. Even more discomforting, the wife fears a dark entity is possessing her husband, causing blackouts and fits of anger.

episodes.name: Keeper of the Light
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey visit a desolate island off the coast of Newport, Rhode Island. Disease, disaster and utter isolation have allowed spirits to fester, leading to reports of terrifying paranormal activity from employees and guests.

episodes.name: The Body Box
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey investigate an old hospital in South Pittsburg, Tennessee. Once a beacon of hope, the abandoned building now hoards spirits of the dead, including a dog-like entity called the Creeper.

episodes.name: Stage Fright
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey are granted exclusive access to the Paramount Theatre in Asbury Park, NJ. The location's bright future is marred by a tragic past. Can the team bring peace to the lost souls trapped inside the historic building?

episodes.name: Devil In Salem
episodes.overview: The team travels to Salem to investigate the home of John Proctor, one of the men executed during the infamous witch trials.

episodes.name: Zombie Boy
episodes.overview: Researching claims of possession and lost time at a historic estate in Middleborough, Mass.; a mind-bending discovery makes the team realize that the paranormal field is more dangerous than anyone anticipated.

episodes.name: False Witness
episodes.overview: In 1673, Rebecca Cornell was found murdered in her Rhode Island home; days later, her ghost testified against her son; the team attempts to conjure the spirits who played a part in the centuries-old crime and reveal the truth.

episodes.name: Shadowed
episodes.overview: The new owners of the Toboggan Inn fear an aggressive entity that resides in the building. Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and psychic medium Chip Coffey travel to Eagle Bay, New York, where they conduct a groundbreaking experiment that bears shocking results.

episodes.name: Fright Train
episodes.overview: A New Hampshire inn is home to apparitions so vivid they’re mistaken as living people. But are they dangerous? Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey check in to find out what powerful energy awoke this haunted house from a deep slumber.

episodes.name: Dead Stop
episodes.overview: A recent flurry of ghostly activity may mean that more than one dead guest calls the historic Cashtown Inn home in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania. Amy Bruni and Adam Berry bring in psychic medium Chip Coffey to help them uncover the source of the supernatural flare-up.

episodes.name: Sea Witch
episodes.overview: A bloody encounter with an aggressive spirit leads the caretaker of the USS Salem to call on Amy Bruni and Adam Berry to investigate the massive Navy destroyer. A late-in-the-game realization by psychic medium Chip Coffey may solve this troubling haunt.

episodes.name: Buried Alone
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and psychic medium Chip Coffey conduct a spiritual sweep of Fort Adams, a massive military structure haunted by dead soldiers and victims of various crimes. But one lost and lonely spirit stands apart from all the others.

episodes.name: The Haunting Of Graestone Manor
episodes.overview: Photographic evidence of injured paranormal investigators spurs Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey to investigate a dark presence in a Victorian mansion. The team suspects a recently unearthed graveyard may have triggered the ghostly activity.

episodes.name: Hidden Passage
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey face a residential crisis as they investigate a sudden haunting in Massachusetts. The case takes a bizarre turn when it appears a family member's actions control the aggressive entity.

episodes.name: The Undertaker's Secret
episodes.overview: An old Masonic temple shrouded in mystery and local lore; a hair-raising paranormal investigation with psychic medium Chip Coffey leads to a daunting reality.

episodes.name: Watch Over Me
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni and Adam Berry visit a home plagued by paranormal activity; the discovery of an old shoe might have triggered the haunting, but the homeowner can't be sure; they, along with psychic medium Chip Coffey, unseal the attic to find answers.

episodes.name: The Lurker
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey investigate an 1850s manor in Upper Marlboro, Maryland, where an eyeless entity looms over sleeping guests. Bruni and Berry attempt an off-the-cuff experiment that bends paranormal reality so much they shock themselves.

episodes.name: Tripwire
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey investigate a tiny house with a huge paranormal problem. The mother and daughter who own the home tell stories of a ghastly traveler with eternal ties and of another, much darker, spirit.

episodes.name: Toxic Relations
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey investigate a century-old house in Little Rock, Arkansas, stricken by tragedy. The former occupants met a series of unfortunate deaths, and their spirits still linger in the home. This is more than a haunt — it’s a Victorian mystery!

episodes.name: Carriage House Creeper
episodes.overview: Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey investigate the second-oldest structure in Vermont with a haunted past, but a fresh set of new owners are experiencing paranormal problems for the first time in their lives.

episodes.name: Tradition Dies Hard
episodes.overview: Amy, Adam and Chip investigate an iconic mansion that was converted into a museum at the request of a dying matriarch; now, her family's spirits haunt the museum; the team attempts to cross over into the spiritual realm to find answers.

episodes.name: Disorderly Conduct
episodes.overview: Amy, Adam and Chip investigate escalating paranormal problems at a home undergoing renovations; the entities within are fiercely protective of the property and lash out when the team attempts to communicate.

episodes.name: Death Alley
episodes.overview: Amy, Adam and Chip investigate a century-old theater haunted by a menacing shadow figure; employees worry the uninvited guest may have come from a nearby alley rumored to be the site of many murders.

episodes.name: Death Interrupted
episodes.overview: The caretaker of a defunct insane asylum calls on Amy Bruni, Adam Berry and Chip Coffey to help with a troubling new development. Recent renovations have awakened a ghastly presence, and it is stirring up unrest amongst the building's resident spirits.

episodes.name: Broken Spirits
episodes.overview: Amy, Adam and Chip visit a former poor farm in Pennsylvania where intense paranormal activity is terrifying employees and guests; the team tries to rectify the horrors of the past and bring peace to this haunted place.

episodes.name: What Lies Below
episodes.overview: The team are called to the town of Palmyra, N.Y., to investigate aggressive paranormal activity at a museum; questions are asked if a recent fire triggered a family of spirits, or if the ghost of a barbaric doctor is behind the haunting.

episodes.name: Beware the Occult
episodes.overview: The team delves into a case of biblical proportions when a worried widow calls for help after experiencing paranormal activity in her Pittsburgh home.

episodes.name: Ghost Ships
episodes.overview: The team investigate a freighter that once sailed the Great Lakes; something lurks onboard the ship, and it's becoming more aggressive; the ghostly activity might be tied to artifacts from one of the worst shipwrecks in American history.

episodes.name: The Angry Ghost
episodes.overview: The team answer a desperate family's plea for help in rural New York. Dark apparitions are showing extreme aggression in their home, scratching and attacking all who live there. Can the team get to the bottom of who is haunting the house?

episodes.name: Ghost Wars
episodes.overview: Amy, Adam and Chip go to Rhode Island to investigate a haunted library that has been displaying paranormal activity for decades; books fly from shelves, objects launch off desks, and names are called out at night.

episodes.name: Living with the Dead
episodes.overview: The team rush to help a family in need; an aggressive spirit lives in their home and will not leave them alone; the haunting is so bad that they've sealed off part of the house to contain it.

episodes.name: Shadow in the Night
episodes.overview: The team help a mother and her children who are haunted by a terrifying shadow figure; the family fears the entity might have entered their home through a portal and may be tied to a nearby.

episodes.name: Undertaker's Return
episodes.overview: The team embark on a terrifying case in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, when they investigate an early 1800s home haunted by a tall shrouded figure that is obsessed with the caretaker. Who is this spirit? And why did it suddenly appear?

episodes.name: The Country Club Murders
episodes.overview: The team investigate a West Virginia country club notorious for an unsolved double homicide on a secluded lovers' lane; the murdered lovebirds may now haunt the halls of the grand establishment, or something more sinister may be at play.
